document.full_text: rapid dissemination and reposting in social media make it nigh impossible to scrub unwanted images and text from the web, so a doctor must be vigilant about what gets posted.
document.title: should your doctor be on facebook?
lines_and_colors: rapid dissemination and reposting in social media make it nigh impossible to scrub unwanted images and text from the web, so a doctor must be vigilant about what gets posted.
